parts.text:
```text
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
# Affidavit of [Client Name]

## 1. Identification

I, [Client Name], being duly sworn, depose and state as follows:

1.  My name is [Client Name]. I am over the age of eighteen (18) years and am competent to testify to the matters set forth herein.
2.  My current address is [Client Address].
3.  My date of birth is [Client Date of Birth].

## 2. Background

4.  I am the [Plaintiff/Defendant] in the matter of [Case Name], Case Number [Case Number], currently pending in the [Court Name] of [Jurisdiction].
5.  [Provide a brief, neutral description of the case. E.g., "This case concerns a dispute over a breach of contract."]

## 3. Factual Allegations

6.  On or about [Date], I [Describe your action or event. Be specific. E.g., "entered into a written agreement with [Opposing Party Name] to provide consulting services."]. A copy of said agreement is attached hereto as Exhibit A.
7.  [Opposing Party Name] [Describe the opposing party's action or event. Be specific. E.g., "failed to pay me for the consulting services I provided, as outlined in the agreement."].
8.  As a result of [Opposing Party Name]'s actions, I have suffered [Describe the damages you have suffered. Be specific. E.g., "financial losses in the amount of $[Amount], as well as emotional distress."].
9.  [Provide any additional relevant facts, numbered sequentially. E.g., "I have made repeated attempts to contact [Opposing Party Name] to resolve this matter, but they have not responded."].
10. [Provide any additional relevant facts, numbered sequentially. E.g., "I have retained legal counsel to represent me in this matter."].

## 4. Sworn Oath

I declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of [State/Jurisdiction] that the foregoing is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.

Executed this [Day] day of [Month], [Year].

____________________________
[Client Name]

## 5. Notary Acknowledgment

State of [State]

County of [County]

On this [Day] day of [Month], [Year], before me, the undersigned, a Notary Public in and for said State, personally appeared [Client Name], known to me (or satisfactorily proven) to be the person whose name is subscribed to the within instrument and acknowledged that he/she executed the same for the purposes therein contained.

In witness whereof, I hereunto set my hand and official seal.

____________________________
[Notary Public Name]
Notary Public in and for the State of [State]
My commission expires: [Date]

[Notary Seal (if applicable)]

**Exhibit A:** [Attach relevant document, e.g., the contract]
</TEXT>
```

citations.title: Issues Concerning the Failure of Federally-insured Federal Credit Unions
